Vej Ninja

Game information/description

Did you ever thought of playing Fruit Ninja on your PC? The solution is here in Bepary.inc, but it's more unique, it's called Vej Ninja. Cut the vegetable lile a ninja because you are a ninja when you play this game.

Controls

  • Use the mouse to cut the 'Vej'. Left Click and hold it.
  • To pause the game press P.
  • To exit the game press E.
  • To restart the game press R.
  • To go back to the main menu press M.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.


Some of the resources in this game are from other publishers. This game is for educational purposes only.
